code: import{RequestTool}from'../Tools/RequestTool';var GetAll=function GetAll(){return RequestTool.GetRequest("https://localhost:6001/api/Education/GetAll");};var Add=function Add(_item){return RequestTool.PostRequest("https://localhost:6001/api/Education/Add",_item);};var Update=function Update(_item){return RequestTool.PutRequest("https://localhost:6001/api/Education/Update",_item);};var AddUser=function AddUser(_item){return RequestTool.PostRequest("https://localhost:6001/api/JoinEducation/Add",_item);};var GetAllUsers=function GetAllUsers(_courseId){return RequestTool.GetRequest("https://localhost:6001/api/JoinEducation/GetAll/"+_courseId);};export var EducationService={GetAll:GetAll,Add:Add,Update:Update,AddUser:AddUser,GetAllUsers:GetAllUsers};
